alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Southern Columbia; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bradford, southern Baker, Union and southeastern Columbia Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sanderson to near Lulu. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Lake Butler, Raiford, Palestine Community, Upland Pines, Groves, Providence, Lulu, Beasley, New River and Ellerbee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
